name: Differences Online
description:
Find the differences between two pictures online!
Spot all the differences, win tournaments and get reward before your opponents!

FEATURES
— Zoom the picture to see all details
— Use the hint option to provide a clue
— Countdown to end round
— Fast and attentive opponents
— Beautiful and amazing world
— Many levels of of varied difficulty
— Rich graphics and fantastic special effects
— Full color images
— Free to play

How attentive and fast are you? Take the challenge now!
